member.name: M:Edelweiss.Mapping.Entities.EntityData.NodeLineRenderType(Edelweiss.Mapping.Entities.Entity)
member.summary:
Determines how nodes are connected to the main entity.
none: nodes are not connected to the main entity.
line: nodes are connected to the previous node
fan: all nodes are connected directly to the main entity
circle: nodes draw a circle around the main entity.
In Edelweiss, circle supports multiple nodes, not just one. Each will draw a circle around the entity.
Defaults to none.
member.param: The entity instance

member.summary: Gets the fields of the entity from the placement

member.summary: A list of two floats ranging from 0 to 1. Determines the position of the sprite relative to the entity's position.
member.param: The room the entity is in
The entity instance

member.name: F:Edelweiss.Network.Netcode.ADD_ITEM
member.summary:
Adds an item to a ZoomableView.
Paramters:
- widget: the tracker for the ZoomableView to add the item to
- item: the JSON representation of the item
- parent (optional): the name of the parent item of this item. Must be in the same ZoomableView

member.name: F:Edelweiss.Network.Netcode.MODIFY_ITEM_SHAPE
member.summary:
Modifies the shape data of a particular shape of an item.
Parameters:
- widget: the tracker for the ZoomableView the item is in
- item: the name of the item the shape is in
- index: the index of the shape in the item's shapes array
- data: the modified data the shape should have

member.name: F:Edelweiss.Network.Netcode.MODIFY_ITEM
member.summary:
Modifies the item data of a particular item.
Parameters:
- widget: the tracker for the ZoomableView the item is in
- item: the name of the item
- data: the modified data the item should have

member.name: F:Edelweiss.Network.Netcode.REGISTER_TOOLBAR
member.summary:
Changes the toolbar to the desired JSON representation.
No parameters, only the JSON representation of the toolbar should be sent.

member.name: F:Edelweiss.Network.Netcode.OPEN_POPUP_FORM
member.summary:
Opens a popup widget with the passed JSON representation and treats it as a form.
No parameters, only the JSON representation of the widget should be sent.
Form JSON files must be loaded with before being sent

member.name: F:Edelweiss.Network.Netcode.SYNC_VARIABLE
member.summary:
Syncs a variable of a given name and value with the frontend.
Parameters:
- name: the name of the variable
- value: the value of the variable

member.name: F:Edelweiss.Network.Netcode.REFRESH_WIDGETS
member.summary:
Refreshes widgets with the given trackers
Parameters:
- widgets: the list of widget trackers that should be refreshed.
